data.name: Ein's Sword Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a demo version of EIn's Sword, scheduled for release in July 2022.

You can play Stage 1.
The save data will be carried over to the full version. (For the same device).

Recommended Specs
If you can play the demo version, you can play the full version.
data.about_the_game:
This is a demo version of EIn's Sword, scheduled for release in July 2022.

You can play Stage 1.
The save data will be carried over to the full version. (For the same device).

Recommended Specs
If you can play the demo version, you can play the full version.
data.short_description: A simple 3D action game where you defeat enemies in stages. Raise the level of the main character, Ein, and defeat strong enemies to obtain the legendary sword.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
